COOKIE_TEST_MESSAGE.message: This is a test message about a cookie.
COOKIE_TEST_MESSAGE.description: A test message that is shown in a panel

NUM_LINES_TEST_MESSAGE.message: There {numLines, plural, =0 {are no lines} =1 {is one line} other {are # lines}}.
NUM_LINES_TEST_MESSAGE.description: A test message that is shown in a panel

MORPH_TUFTS_NO_ENGINE_FOR_LANGUAGE.message: There is no engine for the given languageID {languageID}
MORPH_TUFTS_NO_ENGINE_FOR_LANGUAGE.description: Error message for morphology.tufts adapter - when no engine is found for given languageID

MORPH_TUFTS_NO_HOMONYM.message: There is no homonym for the given word - {word} and languageID {languageID}
MORPH_TUFTS_NO_HOMONYM.description: Error message for morphology.tufts adapter - when no homonym was returned from the source

MORPH_TUFTS_NO_ANSWER_FOR_WORD.message: There is no data from the source for the given word - {word} and languageID {languageID}
MORPH_TUFTS_NO_ANSWER_FOR_WORD.description: Error message for morphology.tufts adapter - when no data was returned from the source

MORPH_TUFTS_UNKNOWN_ERROR.description: Error message for morph.tufts adapter - unknown

MORPH_TRANSFORM_NO_LANGUAGE.message: No Language was defined from json object
MORPH_TRANSFORM_NO_LANGUAGE.description: Error message for morph.tufts adapter - transform problem

MORPH_TRANSFORM_NO_LEMMA.message: No Lemma was defined from json object
MORPH_TRANSFORM_NO_LEMMA.description: Error message for morph.tufts adapter - transform problem

MORPH_TRANSFORM_NO_MAPPING_DATA.description: Error message for morph.tufts adapter - transform problem

BASIC_ADAPTER_NO_DATA_FROM_URL.message: Unable to get data from url - {url}
BASIC_ADAPTER_NO_DATA_FROM_URL.description: Error message for basic adapter - when no data was returned from the url

BASIC_ADAPTER_EMPTY_URL.message: Unable to get data from empty url
BASIC_ADAPTER_EMPTY_URL.description: Error message for basic adapter - when empty url was given

BASIC_ADAPTER_UNKNOWN_ERROR.description: Error message for basic adapter - unknown

BASIC_ADAPTER_URL_RESPONSE_FAILED.description: Error message for basic adapter - unknown

MORPH_TREEBANK_NO_URL.message: There is a problem with creating url for the given word - {word}
MORPH_TREEBANK_NO_URL.description: Error message for morph.treebank - no url for fetching data from treebank

MORPH_TREEBANK_NO_ANSWER_FOR_WORD.message: There is no data from the source for the given word - {word}
MORPH_TREEBANK_NO_ANSWER_FOR_WORD.description: Error message for morphology.treebank adapter - when no data was returned from the source

MORPH_TREEBANK_UNKNOWN_ERROR.description: Error message for morph.treebank adapter - unknown

TRANSLATION_INPUT_PREPARE_ERROR.message: Some problems with preparing input for geting translations - {input}
TRANSLATION_INPUT_PREPARE_ERROR.description: Error message for lemmatranslation.alpheios adapter - problems with input

TRANSLATION_UNKNOWN_ERROR.description: Error message for lemmatranslation.alpheios adapter - unknown

TRANSLATION_INCORRECT_LEXEMES.message: There is no correct homonym in input
TRANSLATION_INCORRECT_LEXEMES.description: Error message for lemmatranslation.alpheios adapter - no lexemes

LEXICONS_NO_ALLOWED_URL.message: There are no allowed urls in the options
LEXICONS_NO_ALLOWED_URL.description: Error message for lexicon.alpheios adapter - no urls were found in options

LEXICONS_FAILED_CACHED_DATA.message: There is a problem with catching data from lexicon source - {message}
LEXICONS_FAILED_CACHED_DATA.description: Error message for lexicon.alpheios adapter - some problems with getting cached data

LEXICONS_FAILED_APPEND_DEFS.message: There is a problem with updating definitions - {message}
LEXICONS_FAILED_APPEND_DEFS.description: Error message for lexicon.alpheios adapter - some problems with updating definitions

LEXICONS_NO_FULL_URL.message: No full url is defined for definitions
LEXICONS_NO_FULL_URL.description: Error message for lexicon.alpheios adapter - no full url is defined

LEXICONS_NO_DATA_FROM_URL.description: Error message for lexicon.alpheios adapter - no data from url

CONCORDANCE_AUTHOR_UPLOAD_ERROR.message: Some problems with retrieving from author/textWork config file - {message}
CONCORDANCE_AUTHOR_UPLOAD_ERROR.description: Error message for wordusageExamples.concordance adapter - problems with uploading data from author-work config file

CONCORDANCE_WORD_USAGE_FETCH_ERROR.message: Some problems with fetching word usage examples from concordance api - {message}
CONCORDANCE_WORD_USAGE_FETCH_ERROR.description: Error message for wordusageExamples.concordance adapter - problems with fetching word usage examples from concordance api
